Title: The Lion King
Description: Simba, a young lion prince, is cast out of his pride by his evil uncle, who claims he killed his father. Simba, after being raised in a jungle, must embrace his destiny as the rightful king of the Pride Lands and defeat his uncle Scar.
Awards: Golden Globe Award for Best Original Song

Title: Mowgli: Legend of the Jungle
Description: The story of Mowgli, a young boy raised by wolves in the jungle of India, who is forced to leave after a dangerous tiger named Shere Khan threatens his life. Mowgli embarks on a journey of self-discovery, learning about humanity, while trying to avoid the dangers of the jungle.

Title: Doctor Strange
Description: Dr. Stephen Strange, a gifted neurosurgeon, loses the use of his hands in a car accident. Seeking a cure, he travels to Nepal where he learns the mystic arts from the Ancient One, discovering his true potential as a powerful sorcerer who must stop a dark force from destroying the world.

Title: John Wick
Description: John Wick, a retired hitman, seeks vengeance against those who killed his beloved dog, a final gift from his deceased wife. In the process, he takes on the criminal underworld, seeking justice while using his unmatched combat skills.
Awards: Best Action Movie Award at Critics' Choice Awards

Title: The Notebook
Description: In 1940s North Carolina, Noah Calhoun and Allie Nelson fall in love during the summer. Despite the obstacles of class and family opposition, their love endures. Decades later, Allie suffers from Alzheimer's, and Noah must bring her back to their past so they can relive their love story.
Awards: Teen Choice Award for Best Romance Movie
